Html:
I create custom MyGraphLayout:GraphLayout class, set to its property Graph my custom BidirectionalGraph<<>> instance
When content of any my vertex changing, graphLayout does not repaint this text.
How to manually repaint GraphLayout?
Graphlayout.Relayout() - fails
